name: I just wanted candy
description:
"I just wanted candy" is very small game made for halloween game jam Jam info.

It was my first jam btw.

How To Play?

Move with "wasd" (qwerty keyboard) and "left mouse" to shoot pumpkins.

Open gifts to find candies when you have at least 20 you can escape to win.

Yellow gifts are harder to open but give 3 to 5 candies.

Red ones take less time, but they contain a bomb which will cause damage if not defused correctly they also give 3 to 5 candies

Blue ones are small and take less time comparing to the yellow ones but only give 0 or 1.

Green ones give 1 to 2.

Restart with "F1"
